alert.note: Alert for Accomack (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 5:27PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Accomack County through 615 PM EDT... At 527 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Onancock, or 10 miles north of Exmore, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Onancock, Onley, Accomac, Melfa, Keller, Locustville, Harborton, Pungoteague and Tasley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
